resources.string:
Click on your avatar in order to change haircolor or gender. 

Click on one of the exercise-buttons to start exercising. 

The completed exercises will have green buttons. 

Your result will be measured in hairloss. 

The only way to become stronger is to train until your hair falls off..

This app needs the accelerometer in your phone to measure steps, squats and sit-ups. Without it there is no way to measure your result or see your progress. \n\nIf you can no longer allow access through the app you can change it if you go to: Settings > Applications > One Punch Man Trainer > Permissions

In this app you will go through the same training as One Punch Man. 
If you are new to training be careful not to over exert or strain yourself. 
Make sure to eat at least three meals per day (a banana for breakfast is fine). 

Good luck!
Before you start training you need to create an avatar. You can always change your avatar later.
The step counter is set to only record big movements. Therefore it might not give an accurate result if you are just walking. Make sure to run in order for the sensor to work properly.\n\nGood luck!
Keep your back as straight as possible and touch your nose on the screen on the way down.\n\nGood luck!
Make sure to have proper form (look at the example) and do the squats nice and slow. That way you will get the most out of your training as well as a more accurate reading.\n\nGood luck!
Make sure to have proper form (look at the example) and do the sit-upsnice and slow. That way you will get the most out of your training as well as a more accurate reading.\n\nGood luck!
The intent came from the training activity
